attributes.action: Introduce a option to withdraw Consent to be governed
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned understand in the United Kingdom we are governed by consent, we demand a option to withdraw this presumed consent.

Furthermore, we believe we that those who do not wish to be part of this failing corrupt system should be provided a area to be be free beings and not corporately owned entities.

Any failing to provide a option for the true freedom of human beings, can only be classed as politician ownership and therefore illegal.

We the undersigned are equal and do not recognise any higher authority over us, other then that of our creator.
